original_text: “‘Greece, Tubal and Meshek did business with you; they traded human beings and articles of bronze for your wares.
korean_text: 야완과 두발과 메섹은 네 상인이 되었음이여 사람과 놋그릇을 가지고 네 상품을 바꾸어 갔도다

sentences.original_text: Greece, Tubal and Meshek did business with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스, 두발과 메섹이 너와 상거래를 하였으며

sentences.original_text: and articles of bronze for your wares
